official_title: A bill to authorize appropriations for the studies under the National Flood Insurance Act of 1968 for the fiscal years 1981 and 1982.

summary.text: Authorizes appropriations for fiscal year 1981 for flood insurance program studies. Authorizes necessary appropriations for fiscal year 1982.

titles.title: A bill to authorize appropriations for the studies under the National Flood Insurance Act of 1968 for the fiscal years 1981 and 1982.
